data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The radiated tortoise has a black patch on its head. Its ____ legs ____ yellow. Its ____ is ____ most ____ feature. The ____ is ____ and ____ with a pattern ____ yellow ____ on ____. The radiated tortoise can weigh up to 35 lbs.
data.partBlankContent: The radiated tortoise has a black patch on its head. Its sc___ legs a__ yellow. Its sh___ is i__ most impre_____ feature. The sh___ is bl___ and bu___ with a pattern o_ yellow str____ on i_. The radiated tortoise can weigh up to 35 lbs.
data.fullContent: The radiated tortoise has a black patch on its head. Its scaly legs are yellow. Its shell is its most impressive feature. The shell is black and bumpy with a pattern of yellow stripes on it. The radiated tortoise can weigh up to 35 lbs.
data.answer: 这只放射的乌龟头上有一块黑色的斑点。它有鳞的腿是黄色的。它的外壳是它最令人印象深刻的特征。外壳是黑色的，凹凸不平，上面有黄色条纹的图案。放射的龟可以重达35磅。
